PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Thermogravimetric analysis ( TGA ) plots of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) is shown in Figure 1.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |

The two "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "Thermogravimetric analysis (TGA)" and "PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)". "Thermogravimetric analysis (TGA)" is a technique used to measure the weight change of a material as a function of temperature or time. "PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)" is a chemical compound being analyzed in the study.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) |

After reviewing the paragraph, I have determined that there is only one "Property Value" entity, which is "Thermogravimetric analysis (TGA)". This technique measures the weight change of a material as a function of temperature or time, and thus, it is a property of the material being analyzed. The other entity, "PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)", is a chemical compound being analyzed, but it is not a property of the material.
